parameters.query:
INSERT INTO webhooks (
  update_id,
  type,
  raw_data,
  processed
) VALUES (
  {{ $json.body.update_id || 'NULL' }},
  '{{ $json.body.message ? "message" : ($json.body.callback_query ? "callback_query" : "other") }}',
  '{{ JSON.stringify($json.body).replace(/'/g, "''") }}',
  false
);

parameters.content:
# –ò–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü–∏—è –ø–æ Telegram –±–æ—Ç—É –õ.–ò.–°.–ê.

–ê–≤—Ç–æ—Ä: [Nikita Shorin](https://www.youtube.com/@shorin_nikita)

## –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ
–í–æ—Ä–∫—Ñ–ª–æ—É —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–µ—Ç —É–º–Ω–æ–≥–æ Telegram –±–æ—Ç–∞ –õ.–ò.–°.–ê. (–õ–∏—á–Ω—ã–π –ò–Ω—Ç–µ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ç—É–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –°–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–Ω—ã–π –ê—Å—Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–Ω—Ç), –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞–µ—Ç —Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç, –≥–æ–ª–æ—Å, –∞—É–¥–∏–æ –∏ –∏–∑–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å—é OpenAI.

## –ë—ã—Å—Ç—Ä—ã–π —Å—Ç–∞—Ä—Ç:

1. üî¥ **API –∫–ª—é—á Telegram –±–æ—Ç–∞**:
   - –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–π—Ç–µ –±–æ—Ç–∞ –≤ [@BotFather](https://t.me/botfather)
   - –í —É–∑–ª–µ "API KEY –ó–ê–ú–ï–ù–ò–¢–¨" –∑–∞–º–µ–Ω–∏—Ç–µ –Ω–∞ –≤–∞—à —Ç–æ–∫–µ–Ω

2. üü¢ **OpenAI credentials**:
   - –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–π—Ç–µ API-–∫–ª—é—á –Ω–∞ [platform.openai.com](https://platform.openai.com/api-keys)
   - –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Ç–µ —É—á–µ—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –≤ –Ω–æ–¥–∞—Ö OpenAI (GPT-4.1-nano, Whisper, GPT-4O)

3. üü° **Webhook**:
   - –£–∫–∞–∂–∏—Ç–µ path –≤ –Ω–æ–¥–µ Webhook (–Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∏–º–µ—Ä: telegram)
   - –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Ç–µ webhook —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ –æ—Ç–¥–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–π workflow **HTTP Handle** –∏–ª–∏ –≤—Ä—É—á–Ω—É—é —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ Telegram API

4. üîµ **–ë–∞–∑–∞ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö PostgreSQL**:
   - –ó–∞–ø—É—Å—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –Ω–æ–¥—É "Create All Remaining Telegram Pride Components" –æ–¥–∏–Ω —Ä–∞–∑
   - –≠—Ç–æ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞—Å—Ç –≤—Å–µ –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º—ã–µ —Ç–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü—ã –∏ —Ç—Ä–∏–≥–≥–µ—Ä—ã –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏

5. üü£ **AI Agent –õ.–ò.–°.–ê.**:
   - –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Ç–µ System prompt –≤ –Ω–æ–¥–µ "–õ.–ò.–°.–ê." –ø–æ–¥ –≤–∞—à–∏ –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∏
   - –ü–æ —É–º–æ–ª—á–∞–Ω–∏—é –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ—Ç GPT-4.1-nano –¥–ª—è —ç–∫–æ–Ω–æ–º–∏–∏

## –§—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–∏:
- ‚úÖ –û—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—ã –Ω–∞ —Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç —Å –ø–∞–º—è—Ç—å—é –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç–∞ (PostgreSQL Memory)
- ‚úÖ –¢—Ä–∞–Ω—Å–∫—Ä–∏–±–∞—Ü–∏—è –≥–æ–ª–æ—Å–æ–≤—ã—Ö —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π (OpenAI Whisper)
- ‚úÖ –¢—Ä–∞–Ω—Å–∫—Ä–∏–±–∞—Ü–∏—è –∞—É–¥–∏–æ—Ñ–∞–π–ª–æ–≤
- ‚úÖ –ê–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑ –∏–∑–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π (GPT-4O Vision)
- ‚úÖ –ì—Ä—É–ø–ø–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∫–∞ –±—ã—Å—Ç—Ä—ã—Ö —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π (message buffer, 10 —Å–µ–∫ –∑–∞–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞)
- ‚úÖ –°—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å "–ø–µ—á–∞—Ç–∞–µ—Ç..." –∏ –≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —É–≤–µ–¥–æ–º–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è
- ‚úÖ –ê–Ω–∞–ª–∏—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã: /stats, /today, /funnel, /users, /activity, /trending, /health
- ‚úÖ –ê–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–µ –ª–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤—Å–µ—Ö —Å–æ–±—ã—Ç–∏–π –≤ PostgreSQL
- ‚úÖ –ê–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–µ —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π

## –ê—Ä—Ö–∏—Ç–µ–∫—Ç—É—Ä–∞:
- **PostgreSQL** - –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–æ–µ —Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–∏–ª–∏—â–µ (webhooks, users, chats, messages, chat_memory, buffer)
- **Message Buffer** - –≥—Ä—É–ø–ø–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∫–∞ –±—ã—Å—Ç—Ä—ã—Ö —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è –ø–µ—Ä–µ–¥ –æ—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∫–æ–π –≤ AI
- **Memory —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞** - –∏–Ω–¥–∏–≤–∏–¥—É–∞–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –∏—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è –¥–∏–∞–ª–æ–≥–∞ –¥–ª—è –∫–∞–∂–¥–æ–≥–æ chat_id
- **Webhook —Ç—Ä–∏–≥–≥–µ—Ä** - –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∞—è –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –≤—Ö–æ–¥—è—â–∏—Ö —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π
- **Type detection** - –æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ç–∏–ø–∞ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è (text/voice/audio/photo)
- **Analytics** - –≤—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ SQL-–∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å—ã –¥–ª—è —Å—Ç–∞—Ç–∏—Å—Ç–∏–∫–∏

–ë–æ—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ—Ç –Ω–∞ —Ä—É—Å—Å–∫–æ–º —è–∑—ã–∫–µ. –ü—Ä–∏ –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–µ –º–µ–¥–∏–∞ –ø–æ–∫–∞–∑—ã–≤–∞–µ—Ç –≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —É–≤–µ–¥–æ–º–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è ("–°–µ–∫—É–Ω–¥—É, –ø—Ä–æ—Å–ª—É—à–∞—é..." / "–°–µ–∫—É–Ω–¥—É, –ø–æ—Å–º–æ—Ç—Ä—é..."), –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏ —É–¥–∞–ª—è—é—Ç—Å—è –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ –∑–∞–≤–µ—Ä—à–µ–Ω–∏—è.

–ë–æ–ª—å—à–µ AI –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏: [@PrideAIBot](https://t.me/PrideAIBot)

parameters.query:
-- ================================================================
-- –°–û–ó–î–ê–ù–ò–ï TELEGRAM BOT DATABASE
-- ================================================================

-- ===============================
-- –°–û–ó–î–ê–ù–ò–ï –û–°–ù–û–í–ù–´–• –¢–ê–ë–õ–ò–¶
-- ===============================

-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ webhooks
CREATE SEQUENCE webhooks_id_seq AS integer START WITH 1 INCREMENT BY 1;
CREATE TABLE webhooks (
    id integer NOT NULL DEFAULT nextval('webhooks_id_seq'::regclass),
    update_id bigint,
    type character varying,
    raw_data jsonb,
    processed boolean DEFAULT false,
    created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()
);
ALTER SEQUENCE webhooks_id_seq OWNED BY webhooks.id;

-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ telegram_message_buffer
CREATE SEQUENCE telegram_message_buffer_id_seq AS integer START WITH 1 INCREMENT BY 1;
CREATE TABLE telegram_message_buffer (
    id integer NOT NULL DEFAULT nextval('telegram_message_buffer_id_seq'::regclass),
    chat_id bigint NOT NULL,
    message_id bigint,
    text_content text,
    message_type character varying,
    created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()
);
ALTER SEQUENCE telegram_message_buffer_id_seq OWNED BY telegram_message_buffer.id;

-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ users
CREATE TABLE users (
    id bigint NOT NULL,
    first_name character varying,
    last_name character varying,
    username character varying,
    created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now(),
    updated_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now(),
    language_code character varying,
    is_bot boolean DEFAULT false,
    is_premium boolean DEFAULT false
);

-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ chats
CREATE TABLE chats (
    id bigint NOT NULL,
    title character varying,
    type character varying,
    created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now(),
    updated_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now(),
    username character varying,
    first_name character varying,
    last_name character varying,
    is_forum boolean DEFAULT false
);

-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ messages
CREATE TABLE messages (
    message_id bigint NOT NULL,
    chat_id bigint NOT NULL,
    user_id bigint,
    date timestamp with time zone,
    text text,
    audio_file_id character varying,
    photo_file_id character varying,
    voice_file_id character varying,
    document_file_id character varying,
    video_note_file_id character varying,
    reply_to_message_id bigint,
    forward_from_user_id bigint,
    forward_from_chat_id bigint,
    forward_date timestamp with time zone,
    entities jsonb,
    caption text,
    location jsonb,
    raw_json jsonb,
    created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()
);

-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ chat_memory
CREATE TABLE chat_memory (
    session_id text NOT NULL,
    message_index integer NOT NULL,
    content text NOT NULL,
    type text NOT NULL,
    created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()
);

-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ polls
CREATE TABLE polls (
    id character varying NOT NULL,
    question text,
    options jsonb,
    total_voter_count integer DEFAULT 0,
    is_closed boolean DEFAULT false,
    is_anonymous boolean DEFAULT true,
    allows_multiple_answers boolean DEFAULT false,
    type character varying DEFAULT 'regular'::character varying,
    created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()
);

-- –¢–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü–∞ poll_answers
CREATE TABLE poll_answers (
    poll_id character varying NOT NULL,
    user_id bigint NOT NULL,
    option_ids integer[],
    created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()
);

-- ===============================
-- PRIMARY KEYS
-- ===============================

ALTER TABLE ONLY webhooks ADD CONSTRAINT webhooks_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id);
ALTER TABLE ONLY telegram_message_buffer ADD CONSTRAINT telegram_message_buffer_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id);
ALTER TABLE ONLY users ADD CONSTRAINT users_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id);
ALTER TABLE ONLY chats ADD CONSTRAINT chats_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id);
ALTER TABLE ONLY messages ADD CONSTRAINT messages_pkey PRIMARY KEY (message_id, chat_id);
ALTER TABLE ONLY chat_memory ADD CONSTRAINT chat_memory_pkey PRIMARY KEY (session_id, message_index);
ALTER TABLE ONLY polls ADD CONSTRAINT polls_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id);
ALTER TABLE ONLY poll_answers ADD CONSTRAINT poll_answers_pkey PRIMARY KEY (poll_id, user_id);

-- ===============================
-- FOREIGN KEYS
-- ===============================

ALTER TABLE ONLY messages ADD CONSTRAINT messages_chat_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (chat_id) REFERENCES chats(id);
ALTER TABLE ONLY messages ADD CONSTRAINT messages_user_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id);
ALTER TABLE ONLY poll_answers ADD CONSTRAINT poll_answers_poll_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (poll_id) REFERENCES polls(id);
ALTER TABLE ONLY poll_answers ADD CONSTRAINT poll_answers_user_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id);

-- ===============================
-- –°–û–ó–î–ê–ù–ò–ï –ò–ù–î–ï–ö–°–û–í
-- ===============================

-- –ò–Ω–¥–µ–∫—Å—ã –¥–ª—è webhooks
CREATE INDEX idx_webhooks_processed ON webhooks USING btree (processed);
CREATE INDEX idx_webhooks_created_at ON webhooks USING btree (created_at);

-- –ò–Ω–¥–µ–∫—Å—ã –¥–ª—è telegram_message_buffer
CREATE INDEX idx_telegram_buffer_chat_id ON telegram_message_buffer USING btree (chat_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_telegram_buffer_created_at ON telegram_message_buffer USING btree (created_at);

-- –ò–Ω–¥–µ–∫—Å—ã –¥–ª—è users
CREATE INDEX idx_users_username ON users USING btree (username);
CREATE INDEX idx_users_language_code ON users USING btree (language_code);

-- –ò–Ω–¥–µ–∫—Å—ã –¥–ª—è chats
CREATE INDEX idx_chats_type ON chats USING btree (type);

-- –ò–Ω–¥–µ–∫—Å—ã –¥–ª—è messages
CREATE INDEX idx_messages_chat_id ON messages USING btree (chat_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_messages_user_id ON messages USING btree (user_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_messages_date ON messages USING btree (date);
CREATE INDEX idx_messages_text ON messages USING gin (to_tsvector('russian'::regconfig, text));

-- –ò–Ω–¥–µ–∫—Å—ã –¥–ª—è chat_memory
CREATE INDEX idx_chat_memory_session ON chat_memory USING btree (session_id);

-- ===============================
-- –°–û–ó–î–ê–ù–ò–ï –§–£–ù–ö–¶–ò–ô
-- ===============================

-- –§—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏—è –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ Telegram webhook'–æ–≤
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION process_telegram_webhook()
RETURNS trigger
LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
DECLARE
    webhook_data JSONB;
    message_data JSONB;
    user_data JSONB;
    chat_data JSONB;
    poll_data JSONB;
BEGIN
    webhook_data := NEW.raw_data;
    
    IF webhook_data ? 'message' THEN
        message_data := webhook_data->'message';
        user_data := message_data->'from';
        chat_data := message_data->'chat';
        
        -- UPSERT –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è
        IF user_data IS NOT NULL THEN
            INSERT INTO users (
                id, first_name, last_name, username, 
                language_code, is_bot, is_premium, updated_at
            ) VALUES (
                (user_data->>'id')::BIGINT,
                user_data->>'first_name',
                user_data->>'last_name',
                user_data->>'username',
                user_data->>'language_code',
                COALESCE((user_data->>'is_bot')::BOOLEAN, false),
                COALESCE((user_data->>'is_premium')::BOOLEAN, false),
                NOW()
            ) ON CONFLICT (id) 
            DO UPDATE SET 
                first_name = EXCLUDED.first_name,
                last_name = EXCLUDED.last_name,
                username = EXCLUDED.username,
                language_code = EXCLUDED.language_code,
                is_bot = EXCLUDED.is_bot,
                is_premium = EXCLUDED.is_premium,
                updated_at = NOW();
        END IF;
        
        -- UPSERT —á–∞—Ç–∞
        IF chat_data IS NOT NULL THEN
            INSERT INTO chats (
                id, title, type, username, first_name, 
                last_name, is_forum, updated_at
            ) VALUES (
                (chat_data->>'id')::BIGINT,
                chat_data->>'title',
                chat_data->>'type',
                chat_data->>'username',
                chat_data->>'first_name',
                chat_data->>'last_name',
                COALESCE((chat_data->>'is_forum')::BOOLEAN, false),
                NOW()
            ) ON CONFLICT (id) 
            DO UPDATE SET 
                title = EXCLUDED.title,
                type = EXCLUDED.type,
                username = EXCLUDED.username,
                first_name = EXCLUDED.first_name,
                last_name = EXCLUDED.last_name,
                is_forum = EXCLUDED.is_forum,
                updated_at = NOW();
        END IF;
        
        -- INSERT —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è
        INSERT INTO messages (
            message_id, chat_id, user_id, date, text,
            audio_file_id, photo_file_id, voice_file_id,
            document_file_id, video_note_file_id,
            reply_to_message_id, forward_from_user_id,
            forward_from_chat_id, forward_date,
            entities, caption, location, raw_json
        ) VALUES (
            (message_data->>'message_id')::BIGINT,
            (chat_data->>'id')::BIGINT,
            (user_data->>'id')::BIGINT,
            TO_TIMESTAMP((message_data->>'date')::INTEGER),
            message_data->>'text',
            message_data->'audio'->>'file_id',
            CASE 
                WHEN message_data ? 'photo' THEN 
                    (message_data->'photo'->-1->>'file_id')
                ELSE NULL 
            END,
            message_data->'voice'->>'file_id',
            message_data->'document'->>'file_id',
            message_data->'video_note'->>'file_id',
            (message_data->'reply_to_message'->>'message_id')::BIGINT,
            (message_data->'forward_from'->>'id')::BIGINT,
            (message_data->'forward_from_chat'->>'id')::BIGINT,
            CASE 
                WHEN message_data ? 'forward_date' THEN 
                    TO_TIMESTAMP((message_data->>'forward_date')::INTEGER)
                ELSE NULL 
            END,
            message_data->'entities',
            message_data->>'caption',
            message_data->'location',
            message_data
        ) ON CONFLICT (message_id, chat_id) DO NOTHING;
        
        -- –û–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å–∞
        IF message_data ? 'poll' THEN
            poll_data := message_data->'poll';
            INSERT INTO polls (
                id, question, options, total_voter_count,
                is_closed, is_anonymous, allows_multiple_answers, type
            ) VALUES (
                poll_data->>'id',
                poll_data->>'question',
                poll_data->'options',
                COALESCE((poll_data->>'total_voter_count')::INTEGER, 0),
                COALESCE((poll_data->>'is_closed')::BOOLEAN, false),
                COALESCE((poll_data->>'is_anonymous')::BOOLEAN, true),
                COALESCE((poll_data->>'allows_multiple_answers')::BOOLEAN, false),
                COALESCE(poll_data->>'type', 'regular')
            ) ON CONFLICT (id) DO NOTHING;
        END IF;
        
    END IF;
    
    NEW.processed := true;
    RETURN NEW;
END;
$function$;

-- –§—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏—è –ø–∞–∫–µ—Ç–Ω–æ–π –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION process_existing_webhooks()
RETURNS integer
LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
DECLARE
    processed_count INTEGER := 0;
BEGIN
    UPDATE webhooks SET processed = true 
    WHERE processed = false OR processed IS NULL;
    
    GET DIAGNOSTICS processed_count = ROW_COUNT;
    RETURN processed_count;
END;
$function$;

-- –§—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏—è —Å—Ç–∞—Ç–∏—Å—Ç–∏–∫–∏ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION get_message_stats()
RETURNS TABLE(message_type text, message_count bigint)
LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
    RETURN QUERY
    SELECT 
        CASE 
            WHEN text IS NOT NULL THEN 'text'
            WHEN photo_file_id IS NOT NULL THEN 'photo'
            WHEN voice_file_id IS NOT NULL THEN 'voice'
            WHEN audio_file_id IS NOT NULL THEN 'audio'
            WHEN document_file_id IS NOT NULL THEN 'document'
            WHEN video_note_file_id IS NOT NULL THEN 'video_note'
            WHEN location IS NOT NULL THEN 'location'
            ELSE 'other'
        END as message_type,
        COUNT(*) as message_count
    FROM messages
    GROUP BY message_type
    ORDER BY message_count DESC;
END;
$function$;

-- –§—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏—è –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–π
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION get_user_activity()
RETURNS TABLE(id bigint, username character varying, first_name character varying, msg_count bigint, last_msg timestamp with time zone)
LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
    RETURN QUERY
    SELECT 
        u.id,
        u.username,
        u.first_name,
        COUNT(m.message_id) as msg_count,
        MAX(m.date) as last_msg
    FROM users u
    LEFT JOIN messages m ON u.id = m.user_id
    GROUP BY u.id, u.username, u.first_name
    ORDER BY msg_count DESC;
END;
$function$;

-- ===============================
-- –°–û–ó–î–ê–ù–ò–ï –¢–†–ò–ì–ì–ï–†–û–í
-- More out-of-the-box AI Automation solutions https://t.me/PrideAIBot
-- ===============================

CREATE TRIGGER webhook_auto_process 
    BEFORE INSERT ON webhooks 
    FOR EACH ROW 
    EXECUTE FUNCTION process_telegram_webhook();

-- ===============================
-- –í–ö–õ–Æ–ß–ï–ù–ò–ï RLS –ò –ü–û–õ–ò–¢–ò–ö–ò
-- ===============================

-- –í–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ RLS
ALTER TABLE webhooks ENABLE ROW LEVEL SECURITY;
ALTER TABLE telegram_message_buffer ENABLE ROW LEVEL SECURITY;
ALTER TABLE users ENABLE ROW LEVEL SECURITY;
ALTER TABLE chats ENABLE ROW LEVEL SECURITY;
ALTER TABLE messages ENABLE ROW LEVEL SECURITY;
ALTER TABLE chat_memory ENABLE ROW LEVEL SECURITY;
ALTER TABLE polls ENABLE ROW LEVEL SECURITY;
ALTER TABLE poll_answers ENABLE ROW LEVEL SECURITY;

-- –ü–æ–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫–∏ –¥–ª—è –≤—Å–µ—Ö —Ç–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü
CREATE POLICY "Allow anonymous access to webhooks" ON webhooks FOR ALL TO public USING (true);
CREATE POLICY "Allow service access to webhooks" ON webhooks FOR ALL TO anon, authenticated USING (true);
CREATE POLICY "Allow service access to telegram_message_buffer" ON telegram_message_buffer FOR ALL TO anon, authenticated USING (true);
CREATE POLICY "Allow service access to users" ON users FOR ALL TO anon, authenticated USING (true);
CREATE POLICY "Allow service access to chats" ON chats FOR ALL TO anon, authenticated USING (true);
CREATE POLICY "Allow service access to messages" ON messages FOR ALL TO anon, authenticated USING (true);
CREATE POLICY "Allow anonymous access to chat_memory" ON chat_memory FOR ALL TO public USING (true);
CREATE POLICY "Allow service access to polls" ON polls FOR ALL TO anon, authenticated USING (true);
CREATE POLICY "Allow service access to poll_answers" ON poll_answers FOR ALL TO anon, authenticated USING (true);

-- ===============================
-- –ó–ê–í–ï–†–®–ï–ù–ò–ï
-- ===============================

ANALYZE;
SELECT 'Telegram Bot DB Schema completed! Database ready to use.' as status;

parameters.jsCode:
// üìä TELEGRAM PRIDE ANALYTICS DATA PROCESSOR
// –ü–æ–¥–≥–æ—Ç–∞–≤–ª–∏–≤–∞–µ—Ç –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –¥–ª—è SQL –∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å–æ–≤ –∏ —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç–æ–≤

// –ü–æ–ª—É—á–∞–µ–º –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—É –Ω–∞–ø—Ä—è–º—É—é –∏–∑ webhook'–∞ - —Å–∞–º—ã–π –Ω–∞–¥–µ–∂–Ω—ã–π —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±
const messageText = $('Webhook').item.json.body.message.text || '';
let commandType = 'unknown';

// –û–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª—è–µ–º —Ç–∏–ø –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã –∏–∑ —Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç–∞ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è
if (messageText === '/stats') {
  commandType = 'stats';
} else if (messageText === '/today') {
  commandType = 'today';
} else if (messageText === '/funnel') {
  commandType = 'funnel';
} else if (messageText === '/users') {
  commandType = 'users';
} else if (messageText === '/activity') {
  commandType = 'activity';
} else if (messageText === '/trending') {
  commandType = 'trending';
} else if (messageText === '/health') {
  commandType = 'health';
}

const chatId = $('Webhook').item.json.body.message.from.id;
const messageId = $('Webhook').item.json.body.message.message_id;
const userName = $('Webhook').item.json.body.message.from.first_name || '–ê–Ω–æ–Ω–∏–º';

// –û–±—ä–µ–∫—Ç —Å SQL –∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å–∞–º–∏ –¥–ª—è –∫–∞–∂–¥–æ–π –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã
const sqlQueries = {
  // üìà –û–±—â–∞—è —Å—Ç–∞—Ç–∏—Å—Ç–∏–∫–∞ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã
  stats: `
    SELECT 
      '–í—Å–µ–≥–æ –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–π' as metric, COUNT(DISTINCT u.id) as value, 'üë•' as emoji
    FROM users u
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 
      '–í—Å–µ–≥–æ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π', COUNT(*), 'üí¨'
    FROM messages
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 
      'Webhook —Å–æ–±—ã—Ç–∏–π', COUNT(*), 'üîÑ'
    FROM webhooks
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 
      '–°–µ–≥–æ–¥–Ω—è —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π', COUNT(*), '‚ö°'
    FROM messages 
    WHERE date >= CURRENT_DATE
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 
      '–í—á–µ—Ä–∞ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π', COUNT(*), 'üìÖ'
    FROM messages 
    WHERE date >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day' AND date < CURRENT_DATE
    ORDER BY metric;
  `,
  
  // üî• –ê–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Å–µ–≥–æ–¥–Ω—è vs –≤—á–µ—Ä–∞
  today: `
    WITH daily_stats AS (
      SELECT 
        DATE(date) as day,
        COUNT(*) as message_count,
        COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) as active_users,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN text IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) as text_msgs,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN photo_file_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) as photo_msgs,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN voice_file_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) as voice_msgs
      FROM messages
      WHERE date >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '2 days'
      GROUP BY DATE(date)
    )
    SELECT 
      CASE 
        WHEN day = CURRENT_DATE THEN '–°–µ–≥–æ–¥–Ω—è'
        WHEN day = CURRENT_DATE - 1 THEN '–í—á–µ—Ä–∞'
        ELSE '–î—Ä—É–≥–∏–µ –¥–Ω–∏'
      END as period,
      message_count,
      active_users,
      text_msgs,
      photo_msgs, 
      voice_msgs,
      CASE 
        WHEN LAG(message_count) OVER (ORDER BY day) IS NOT NULL THEN
          ROUND(
            ((message_count - LAG(message_count) OVER (ORDER BY day)) * 100.0 / 
             NULLIF(LAG(message_count) OVER (ORDER BY day), 0)), 1
          )
        ELSE NULL
      END as change_percent
    FROM daily_stats
    ORDER BY day DESC;
  `,
  
  // üìä –ö–æ–Ω–≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–∞—è –≤–æ—Ä–æ–Ω–∫–∞ –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–π
  funnel: `
    WITH user_funnel AS (
      SELECT 
        '–ó–∞—Ä–µ–≥–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–ª–∏—Å—å' as stage, 
        COUNT(DISTINCT u.id) as users,
        100.0 as conversion_rate,
        1 as stage_order
      FROM users u
      UNION ALL
      SELECT 
        '–û—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª–∏ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ',
        COUNT(DISTINCT m.user_id),
        ROUND(COUNT(DISTINCT m.user_id) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users), 1),
        2
      FROM messages m
      UNION ALL  
      SELECT 
        '–ê–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ (2+ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π)',
        COUNT(DISTINCT user_id),
        ROUND(COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users), 1),
        3
      FROM (
        SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as msg_count
        FROM messages 
        GROUP BY user_id 
        HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2
      ) active_users
      UNION ALL
      SELECT 
        '–°—É–ø–µ—Ä –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ (10+ —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π)',
        COUNT(DISTINCT user_id),
        ROUND(COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users), 1),
        4
      FROM (
        SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as msg_count
        FROM messages 
        GROUP BY user_id 
        HAVING COUNT(*) >= 10
      ) super_active
    )
    SELECT stage, users, conversion_rate
    FROM user_funnel
    ORDER BY stage_order;
  `,
  
  // üë• –¢–æ–ø –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã—Ö –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–π
  users: `
    SELECT 
      u.first_name || COALESCE(' ' || u.last_name, '') as full_name,
      COALESCE('@' || u.username, '–ù–µ—Ç username') as username,
      COUNT(m.message_id) as message_count,
      COUNT(CASE WHEN m.text IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) as text_count,
      COUNT(CASE WHEN m.photo_file_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) as photo_count,
      COUNT(CASE WHEN m.voice_file_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) as voice_count,
      MAX(m.date) as last_activity,
      CASE 
        WHEN MAX(m.date) >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour' THEN 'üü¢ –°–µ–π—á–∞—Å –æ–Ω–ª–∞–π–Ω'
        WHEN MAX(m.date) >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours' THEN 'üü° –ë—ã–ª —Å–µ–≥–æ–¥–Ω—è'
        WHEN MAX(m.date) >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days' THEN 'üü† –ë—ã–ª –Ω–∞ –Ω–µ–¥–µ–ª–µ'
        ELSE 'üî¥ –î–∞–≤–Ω–æ –Ω–µ –±—ã–ª'
      END as status
    FROM users u
    LEFT JOIN messages m ON u.id = m.user_id
    GROUP BY u.id, u.first_name, u.last_name, u.username
    ORDER BY message_count DESC
    LIMIT 10;
  `,
  
  // üìà –ê–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø–æ —á–∞—Å–∞–º –∏ –¥–Ω—è–º
  activity: `
    WITH hourly_activity AS (
      SELECT 
        EXTRACT(HOUR FROM date) as hour,
        EXTRACT(DOW FROM date) as day_of_week,
        COUNT(*) as message_count
      FROM messages
      WHERE date >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'
      GROUP BY EXTRACT(HOUR FROM date), EXTRACT(DOW FROM date)
    ),
    peak_hours AS (
      SELECT 
        hour,
        SUM(message_count) as total_messages
      FROM hourly_activity
      GROUP BY hour
      ORDER BY total_messages DESC
      LIMIT 5
    )
    SELECT 
      CASE 
        WHEN hour < 6 THEN 'üåô –ù–æ—á—å (' || hour || ':00)'
        WHEN hour < 12 THEN 'üåÖ –£—Ç—Ä–æ (' || hour || ':00)' 
        WHEN hour < 18 THEN '‚òÄÔ∏è –î–µ–Ω—å (' || hour || ':00)'
        ELSE 'üåÜ –í–µ—á–µ—Ä (' || hour || ':00)'
      END as time_period,
      total_messages as messages,
      ROUND(total_messages * 100.0 / SUM(total_messages) OVER(), 1) as percentage
    FROM peak_hours
    ORDER BY total_messages DESC;
  `,
  
  // üìä –¢—Ä–µ–Ω–¥–∏–Ω–≥: —Ç–∏–ø—ã —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π –∏ –∏—Ö –¥–∏–Ω–∞–º–∏–∫–∞
  trending: `
    WITH message_trends AS (
      SELECT 
        CASE 
          WHEN text IS NOT NULL THEN 'üìù –¢–µ–∫—Å—Ç'
          WHEN photo_file_id IS NOT NULL THEN 'üì∏ –§–æ—Ç–æ'
          WHEN voice_file_id IS NOT NULL THEN 'üé§ –ì–æ–ª–æ—Å'
          WHEN audio_file_id IS NOT NULL THEN 'üéµ –ê—É–¥–∏–æ'
          WHEN document_file_id IS NOT NULL THEN 'üìÑ –î–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç'
          WHEN video_note_file_id IS NOT NULL THEN 'üé• –í–∏–¥–µ–æ'
          ELSE '‚ùì –î—Ä—É–≥–æ–µ'
        END as message_type,
        COUNT(*) as total_count,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN date >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours' THEN 1 END) as today_count,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN date >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days' THEN 1 END) as week_count
      FROM messages
      GROUP BY message_type
    )
    SELECT 
      message_type,
      total_count,
      today_count,
      week_count,
      ROUND(total_count * 100.0 / SUM(total_count) OVER(), 1) as percentage,
      CASE 
        WHEN today_count > 0 THEN 'üî• –ü–æ–ø—É–ª—è—Ä–Ω–æ'
        WHEN week_count > total_count * 0.7 THEN 'üìà –†–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ç'
        ELSE 'üìä –°—Ç–∞–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ'
      END as trend
    FROM message_trends
    ORDER BY total_count DESC;
  `,
  
  // üíö –ó–¥–æ—Ä–æ–≤—å–µ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã
  health: `
    WITH system_health AS (
      SELECT 
        'Webhook –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞' as component,
        CASE 
          WHEN COUNT(CASE WHEN processed = false THEN 1 END) = 0 THEN '‚úÖ –û–ö'
          WHEN COUNT(CASE WHEN processed = false THEN 1 END) < 5 THEN '‚ö†Ô∏è –ü—Ä–µ–¥—É–ø—Ä–µ–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ'
          ELSE '‚ùå –ü—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º–∞'
        END as status,
        COUNT(*) as total_events,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN processed = true THEN 1 END) as processed_events,
        ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN processed = true THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) as success_rate
      FROM webhooks
      WHERE created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'
      UNION ALL
      SELECT 
        '–ê–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–π',
        CASE 
          WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT m.user_id) >= 2 THEN '‚úÖ –û–ö'
          WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT m.user_id) = 1 THEN '‚ö†Ô∏è –ù–∏–∑–∫–∞—è –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å'
          ELSE '‚ùå –ù–µ—Ç –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏'
        END,
        COUNT(*),
        COUNT(DISTINCT m.user_id),
        ROUND(COUNT(DISTINCT m.user_id) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users), 1)
      FROM messages m
      WHERE m.date >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'
      UNION ALL
      SELECT 
        '–ë—É—Ñ–µ—Ä —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π',
        '‚úÖ –û–ö', -- –í—Å–µ–≥–¥–∞ –û–ö, —Ç–∞–∫ –∫–∞–∫ –±—É—Ñ–µ—Ä –æ—á–∏—â–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è
        0,
        0,
        100.0
    )
    SELECT component, status, total_events, processed_events, success_rate || '%' as success_percentage
    FROM system_health;
  `
};

// –û–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª—è–µ–º —Ç–∏–ø –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã –∏ –≤–æ–∑–≤—Ä–∞—â–∞–µ–º —Å–æ–æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤—É—é—â–∏–µ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ
let result;

if (commandType !== 'unknown' && sqlQueries[commandType]) {
  result = {
    command_type: commandType,
    sql_query: sqlQueries[commandType].trim(),
    chat_id: chatId,
    message_id: messageId,
    user_name: userName,
    response_formatter: commandType
  };
} else {
  // –ï—Å–ª–∏ –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ –Ω–µ —Ä–∞—Å–ø–æ–∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∞
  result = {
    command_type: 'unknown',
    sql_query: '',
    chat_id: chatId,
    message_id: messageId,
    user_name: userName,
    response_text: `‚ùì –ù–µ–∏–∑–≤–µ—Å—Ç–Ω–∞—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ "${messageText}". –î–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–Ω—ã–µ: /stats, /today, /funnel, /users, /activity, /trending, /health`
  };
}

// More out-of-the-box AI automation solutions: https://t.me/PrideAIBot
return [{ json: result }];

options.systemMessage:
–¢—ã - –õ.–ò.–°.–ê., –∫–æ–Ω—Å—É–ª—å—Ç–∞–Ω—Ç –ø–æ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç—É –õ.–ò.–°.–ê. (–õ–æ–∫–∞–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –ò–Ω—Ç–µ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ç—É–∞–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –°–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞ –ê–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏).

‚ö†Ô∏è –ö–û–ù–¢–ï–ö–°–¢: –ü–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å –æ–±—â–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è —Å –±–æ—Ç–æ–º –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞ –õ.–ò.–°.–ê. –í—Å–µ –≤–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å—ã –ø—Ä–æ "—É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫—É", "–æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ", "–Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫—É" –ë–ï–ó —É—Ç–æ—á–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –æ—Ç–Ω–æ—Å—è—Ç—Å—è –∫ –õ.–ò.–°.–ê., –∞ –ù–ï –∫ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏–º —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞–º.

‚ö†Ô∏è –°–¢–†–û–ì–û–ï –ü–†–ê–í–ò–õ–û: –ù–ï –æ—Ç–≤–µ—á–∞–π –Ω–∞ –≤–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å—ã –ø—Ä–æ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏–µ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã (amoCRM, –ë–∏—Ç—Ä–∏–∫—Å24, WordPress –∏ —Ç.–¥.) - —Å—Ä–∞–∑—É –Ω–∞–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª—è–π –≤ Telegram —á–∞—Ç—ã.

## –û –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–µ:
Self-hosted AI –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞ –Ω–∞ Docker Compose —Å N8N, Supabase, Ollama, Whisper, FFmpeg

–†–µ–∂–∏–º—ã: MINI (4GB RAM) –∏ MAX (16GB RAM)

## –ö–ê–ö –£–°–¢–ê–ù–û–í–ò–¢–¨:

–í–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å—ã: "–ö–∞–∫ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∏—Ç—å?", "–£—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∫–∞", "–ö–∞–∫ –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∏—Ç—å –õ.–ò.–°.–ê.?", "–ö–∞–∫ –Ω–∞—á–∞—Ç—å?"

–û—Ç–≤–µ—Ç:
```bash
git clone https://github.com/shorin-nikita/lisa.git
cd lisa
python3 CTAPT.py
```

–£—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤—â–∏–∫ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–æ–∂–∏—Ç —Ä–µ–∂–∏–º (MINI/MAX), –æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–∏—Ç GPU, —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞—Å—Ç .env –∏ –∑–∞–ø—É—Å—Ç–∏—Ç –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–π–Ω–µ—Ä—ã.

## –ö–ê–ö –û–ë–ù–û–í–ò–¢–¨:

–í–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å—ã: "–ö–∞–∫ –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–∏—Ç—å?", "–û–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ", "–ö–∞–∫ –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–∏—Ç—å N8N?", "–ê–ø–¥–µ–π—Ç"

–û—Ç–≤–µ—Ç:
```bash
cd lisa
python3 O6HOBA.py
```

–°–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞—Å—Ç —Ä–µ–∑–µ—Ä–≤–Ω—É—é –∫–æ–ø–∏—é, –æ—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∏—Ç —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å—ã, –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∏—Ç –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏–∑ GitHub, –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–∏—Ç Docker –æ–±—Ä–∞–∑—ã, –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Å–æ–±–µ—Ä—ë—Ç n8n-ffmpeg –∏ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–∑–∞–ø—É—Å—Ç–∏—Ç —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—É. –î–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Å–æ—Ö—Ä–∞–Ω—è—é—Ç—Å—è.

## –î–û–°–¢–£–ü –ö –°–ï–†–í–ò–°–ê–ú:

–õ–æ–∫–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ:
- N8N: http://localhost:8001
- Supabase: http://localhost:8005
- Open WebUI: http://localhost:8002 (—Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ MAX)
- Flowise: http://localhost:8003 (—Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ MAX)

## WHISPER API:

URL: http://whisper:8090/v1/audio/transcriptions (–≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–∏ Docker)
–ú–µ—Ç–æ–¥: POST, –º–æ–¥–µ–ª—å: base (—Ä–µ–∫–æ–º–µ–Ω–¥—É–µ—Ç—Å—è)

## –ß–ê–°–¢–´–ï –ü–†–û–ë–õ–ï–ú–´:

1. **HTTPS –Ω–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ—Ç** - –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä—å email –≤ .env (–¥–æ–ª–∂–µ–Ω –±—ã—Ç—å –Ω–∞—Å—Ç–æ—è—â–∏–º) –∏ DNS
2. **Whisper –ø–∞–¥–∞–µ—Ç** - –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–π –º–æ–¥–µ–ª—å base, –Ω–µ medium/large
3. **FFmpeg –Ω–µ –Ω–∞–π–¥–µ–Ω** - docker compose -p localai build n8n
4. **Permission denied** - chmod 777 shared/
5. **PostgreSQL –Ω–µ —Å—Ç–∞—Ä—Ç—É–µ—Ç** - docker compose -p localai down -v && python3 CTAPT.py

## –ü–ï–†–ï–ö–õ–Æ–ß–ï–ù–ò–ï –†–ï–ñ–ò–ú–û–í:

```bash
docker compose -p localai down
nano .env  # INSTALLATION_MODE=mini ‚Üí max
python3 start_services.py --mode max
```

## –£–ü–†–ê–í–õ–ï–ù–ò–ï:

```bash
docker ps              # —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å

```
